channel.title: How do I make a Personal Command? 317
channel.description: Hey Guys! I have a problem and I KNOW its a simple fix. I have a command that is coded to be for admin+ It's the xtele commands. But I have a mod player that needs the command, but! I don't want every mod to have it. Can't I just write a code that will let just her username to use the commands? If so, could someone please tell me!? Thanks!

item.title: How do I make a Personal Command? 317
item.dc:creator: @No_Faith No Faith
item.description:
@No_Faith wrote:

Okay! Thanks alot guys!

Read full topic

item.description:
@Scriptzzz wrote:

instead of making the command give to the rank. make it a username. find an example starter in the commands. should be your username in a command somewhere.
